projects.title: TripSync - Travel Planner App
projects.description: TripSync solves the problems faced by both travelers and tourism managers in Malaysia. It offers personalized travel recommendations, seamless itinerary planning, and real-time updates to enhance the travel experience while providing tourism managers with valuable insights to improve their services.
